languages.text: Джай Хейдари встретила смерть в канализации Футфола, среди пустотных крыс, ублюдков и головорезов. Ее тело, порубленное на куски, нашли в зловонном канале вместе с останками ее банды и трупом хладного торговца Фалько. Кто-то убил его, вбив в глотку позолоченную кисть ручного аугмента, сложенную в непристойном жесте.

Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари встретила смерть в канализации Футфола, среди пустотных крыс, ублюдков и головорезов. Ее тело, порубленное на куски, нашли в зловонном канале вместе с останками ее банды и трупом хладного торговца Фалько. Кто-то убил его, вбив в глотку позолоченную кисть ручного аугмента, сложенную в непристойном жесте.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari died in the Footfall sewers among void rats, bastards and thugs. Her severed body was found in a vile channel alongside the remains of her gang and the corpse of a Cold Trader Falco. Someone killed him by driving into his throat a gilded palm of an arm augmentic with an obscene gesture.

Jae Heydari died in the Footfall sewers among void rats, bastards and thugs. Her severed body was found in a vile channel alongside the remains of her gang and the corpse of a Cold Trader Falco. Someone killed him by driving into his throat a gilded palm of an arm augmentic with an obscene gesture.

Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a vile channel next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of Cold Trader Falco. Someone had killed him by driving the gilded hand of an arm augmetic making an obscene gesture into his throat.

Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a vile channel next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of Cold Trader Falco. Someone had killed him by driving the gilded hand of an arm augmetic making an obscene gesture into his throat.

Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利死在了满是卑贱流民的落脚港下水道里。有人在某个臭气熏天的通道里发现了她残缺不全的尸体，而不远处就是她帮派成员的残骸，还有冷市商人法尔科的尸体。法尔科喉咙里塞着一条义体手臂，镀金的手指比着下流的手势。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利死在了满是卑贱流民的落脚港下水道里。有人在某个肮脏的通道里发现了她残缺不全的尸体，而不远处就是她帮派成员的残骸，还有冷市商人法尔科的尸体。法尔科被一只镀金的义体胳膊夺去了性命，婕伊用这条胳膊扭了个下流的手势，把胳膊塞到了法尔科的喉咙里。

languages.text: Jae Heydari starb in der Kanalisation von Footfall zwischen Leerenratten, Verbrechern und Missgeburten. Ihre zerfetzte Leiche wurde in einem stinkenden Kanal entdeckt, neben den Überresten ihrer Bande und dem Leichnam des Kalthändlers Falco. In ihrem Hals steckte ein augmetischer Arm, dessen vergoldete Finger eine obszöne Geste machten.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari starb in der Kanalisation von Footfall, zwischen Leerenratten, Gaunern und Abschaum. Ihre Leiche wurde in Stücke gerissen in einem widerwärtigen Kanal aufgefunden, neben den Überresten ihrer Bande und dem Leichnam des Kalthändlers Falco. Jemand hatte ihn getötet, indem er die vergoldete Hand einer Arm-Augmentation in seinen Rachen gerammt hatte. Die Hand war dabei zu einer obszönen Geste geformt.

languages.text: Jae Heydari mourut dans les égouts de Castel, parmi les rats, les misérables et les malfrats. Son corps démembré fut retrouvé dans un canal d'eaux usées, aux côtés des cadavres de sa bande et de Falco. Quelqu'un avait tué l'adepte du Commerce Froid en enfonçant dans sa gorge un bras augmétique doré dont les doigts formaient un geste obscène.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari mourut dans les égouts de Castel, parmi les rats, les misérables et les malfrats. Son corps démembré fut retrouvé dans un canal d'eaux usées, aux côtés des cadavres de sa bande et de Falco. Quelqu'un avait tué l'adepte du Commerce Froid en enfonçant dans sa gorge un bras augmétique doré dont les doigts formaient un geste obscène.

languages.text: Jae Heydari murió en las cloacas de Paso entre ratas del vacío, fracasados y maleantes. Su cadáver se encontró despedazado en un canal inmundo junto a los restos de su banda y el cuerpo del Comerciante Frío Falco. Alguien lo había asfixiado introduciéndole en la garganta un brazo aumentado cuyos dedos dorados formaban un gesto obsceno.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari murió en las cloacas de Paso entre ratas del vacío, fracasados y maleantes. Su cadáver se encontró despedazado en un canal inmundo junto a los restos de su banda y el cuerpo del Comerciante Frío Falco. Alguien le había matado introduciendo en su garganta la mano dorada de un brazo aumentado mostrando un gesto obsceno.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリはフットフォールの下水道で、ヴォイド・ラットや不運な者、チンピラたちに囲まれて死んだ。バラバラに引き裂かれた彼女の遺体は、一味の残党と闇商人、ファルコの死体と共に、悪臭を放つ水路で発見された。腕のオーグメティックが喉に突き刺されており、その金色の指は卑猥なジェスチャーを連想させるかのように丸められていた。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリはフットフォールの下水道で、ヴォイド・ラットや不運な者、チンピラたちに囲まれて死んだ。バラバラに引き裂かれた彼女の遺体は、一味の残党と闇商人、ファルコの死体と共に、悪臭を放つ水路で発見された。腕のオーグメティックが喉に突き刺されており、その金色の指は卑猥なジェスチャーを連想させるかのように丸められていた。

languages.text: Jae Heydari, Binliman kanalizasyonlarında uçsuz sıçanlarının, garibanların ve serserilerin arasında öldü. Bedeni; kokuşmuş bir kanalda paramparça hâlde, çetesinin kalıntılarının ve Soğuk Tacir Falco'nun cesedinin yanında bulundu. Boğazının yanındaki kol ogmetiğindeki gösterişli parmaklar kıvrılmış, müstehcen bir hareket yapıyordu.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari died in the sewers of Footfall among the void rats, wretches, and thugs. Her body was found torn to pieces in a stinking canal next to the remains of her gang and the corpse of the Cold Trader Falco. An arm augmetic had been driven into his throat, its gilded fingers curled in an obscene gesture.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari, Binliman kanalizasyonlarında, uçsuz sıçanlarının, garibanların ve serserilerin arasında öldü. Bedeni, kokuşmuş bir kanalda, paramparça hâlde, çetesinin kalıntılarının ve Soğuk Tacir Falco'nun cesedinin yanında bulundu. Boğazının yanındaki kol ogmetiğindeki gösterişli parmaklar kıvrılmıştı ve müstehcen bir hareket yapıyordu.
